QuestData.Title: Unfair Fight
QuestData.Description:
A cowardly pest that cheats his way out of the glory of death? Bah!
I have something that'll cut him down where he stands. But such an enhancement requires one who is strong enough to wield it properly.
Show me your mettle and fight! If you can prove yourself, I'll empower that ranseur of yours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prove your strength to Fightlord San.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Fightlord San to begin combat
